Text: Gotta admire you for your dedication to the subject, if nothing else...

To zakimar1
As warned, this is sodomy. So your opinion in principle true, but it does not prevent people from getting the (perverse) pleasure.
Sex with animals is bestiality, not sodomy. Sodomy is, technically, oral and anal sex with people. The title is totally misleading.

To Ichigo_Kurosaki.
The bulk of the drawings is not about bestiality, but sex between furry. Furry are not completely animals, but half the people so they can engage in sodomy, and even more.That can be seen from my collection.
